_sText:
Editor : PennerHörnchen
Creator of Original Map : Z-Machine
Graphics by RiveX and P3NN9R' aka PennerHörnchen

This Map was made for the Just Chill Surf Community!

Watch our Videos on Youtube : wwww.youtube.com/user/Justchillsurf

Also see our great Website : www.just-chill.de

To come to the first sky, fly through the "u" of the Just Chill Wallpaper behind the big "Z".

The teleporter to the 2. sky is behind the rail , where the automatic shotguns are.
You have to fly around this rail, and jump into the back of this rail.

To come to the Secret HeadAdmin Room, where a JetPack and some other cool things are, go into PRE and shoot in the green button of the TOP-Portal.
Then use the secret door at the left.
The 2. door by the secret rooms will open after a few seconds.
There you have to use a key to open the door.
The key is 5487.
To come out of the room shoot the white next to the door!

To come out of the jail, shoot the ball into the white corner!


Have Fun and enjoy this map!
